name: uptownbikes
description: This is a website for Uptown Bikes

scripts.usemin: usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html && usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin buy.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/buy.html && usemin rent.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/rent.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
